name: Alec Istomin
biography: Alec Istomin is an Enterprise Solution Architect at Parallels, Renton, WA. He joined Parallels (called SWsoft at the time) as a developer in early 2000. He has been involved with Linux and Virtualization all these years and led numerous cloud deployments. He has an M.S. in physics and applied mathematics from Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology (MIPT), Moscow.
